languages.text: "Господин Скаландр также передает, что {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкари{/g} готовятся к новым нападениями на вашей территории. Информация от помощников продолжает поступать — Ахиллеас сообщит лично вам о готовящемся нападении в тот же момент, когда будет определена предполагающаяся цель рейда. Друкари умеют заставать противника врасплох и времени на отпор будет немного. По словам господина Скаландра лучшая стратегия в данной ситуации — ваше непосредственное участие в обороне".

traits.locale_text: "Господин Скаландр также передает, что друкари готовятся к новым нападениями на вашей территории. Информация от помощников продолжает поступать — Ахиллеас сообщит лично вам о готовящемся нападении в тот же момент, когда будет определена предполагающаяся цель рейда. Друкари умеют заставать противника врасплох и времени на отпор будет немного. По словам господина Скаландра лучшая стратегия в данной ситуации — ваше непосредственное участие в обороне".

languages.text: "Master Scalander is also reporting the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are getting ready for more attacks on your territory. Information from his aides continues to arrive, and Achilleas will personally report to you the moment the target for the upcoming raid becomes clear. The Drukhari excel at catching their opponents off guard, and there will be little time to mount a response. According to Master Scalander, your personal participation in the defence would be the best strategy, given the circumstances."

traits.locale_text: "Master Scalander is also reporting the Drukhari are getting ready for more attacks on your territory. The information from his aides keeps coming in, and Achilleas will personally report to you the moment the target for the upcoming raid becomes clear. The Drukhari excel at catching their opponents off guard, and there will be little time to mount a response. According to master Scallander, your personal participation in the defense would be the best strategy given the circumstances."

languages.text: “斯卡兰德大师还报告说，{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}正打算进一步袭击您的领土。他的助手此刻正在不断发来新的情报，一旦可以确定敌人接下来的目标，阿吉里亚斯便会向您亲自汇报。黑暗灵族很擅长发动突然袭击，打敌人一个措手不及。根据斯卡兰德大师的说法，若是发生这种情况，您亲自参与防御反击，才是最好的策略。”
languages.original_text: "Master Scalander is also reporting the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are getting ready for more attacks on your territory. Information from his aides continues to arrive, and Achilleas will personally report to you the moment the target for the upcoming raid becomes clear. The Drukhari excel at catching their opponents off guard, and there will be little time to mount a response. According to Master Scalander, your personal participation in the defence would be the best strategy, given the circumstances."

traits.locale_text: “斯卡兰德大师还报告说，{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}正打算进一步袭击您的领土。他的助手此刻正在不断发来新的情报，一旦可以确定敌人接下来的目标，阿吉里亚斯便会向您亲自汇报。黑暗灵族很擅长发动突然袭击，打敌人一个措手不及。根据斯卡兰德大师的说法，若是发生这种情况，您亲自参与防御反击，才是最好的策略。”

languages.text: «El maestro Scalander también informa de que los {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} se están preparando para lanzar más ataques sobre su territorio. No deja de llegarnos información de sus ayudantes, y Achilleas {mf|le|la} informará personalmente en cuanto confirme el objetivo de su próximo asalto. Los Drukhari son expertos en las emboscadas, por lo que apenas tendremos tiempo para preparar una respuesta. Según el maestro Scalander, su participación personal en la defensa sería la mejor estrategia, dadas las circunstancias».
languages.original_text: "Master Scalander is also reporting the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are getting ready for more attacks on your territory. Information from his aides continues to arrive, and Achilleas will personally report to you the moment the target for the upcoming raid becomes clear. The Drukhari excel at catching their opponents off guard, and there will be little time to mount a response. According to Master Scalander, your personal participation in the defence would be the best strategy, given the circumstances."

traits.locale_text: «El maestro Scalander también informa de que los {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} se están preparando para lanzar más ataques sobre su territorio. No deja de llegarnos información de sus ayudantes, y Achilleas {mf|le|la} informará personalmente en cuanto confirme el objetivo de su próximo asalto. Los Drukhari son expertos en las emboscadas, por lo que apenas tendremos tiempo para preparar una respuesta. Según el maestro Scalander, su participación personal en la defensa sería la mejor estrategia, dadas las circunstancias».

languages.text: "Meister Scalander berichtet außerdem, dass die {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} sich auf weitere Angriffe auf euer Gebiet vorbereiten. Informationen von seinen Helfern treffen weiterhin ein, und Achilleas wird euch persönlich Bericht erstatten, sobald das Ziel des bevorstehenden Angriffs feststeht. Die Drukhari verstehen es hervorragend, ihre Gegner zu überrumpeln, und es wird nur wenig Zeit für einen Gegenschlag bleiben. Laut Meister Scalander wäre Ihre persönliche Teilnahme an der Verteidigung unter den gegebenen Umständen die beste Strategie."
languages.original_text: "Master Scalander is also reporting the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are getting ready for more attacks on your territory. Information from his aides continues to arrive, and Achilleas will personally report to you the moment the target for the upcoming raid becomes clear. The Drukhari excel at catching their opponents off guard, and there will be little time to mount a response. According to Master Scalander, your personal participation in the defence would be the best strategy, given the circumstances."

traits.locale_text: "Master Scalander is also reporting the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are getting ready for more attacks on your territory. Information from his aides continues to arrive, and Achilleas will personally report to you the moment the target for the upcoming raid becomes clear. The Drukhari excel at catching their opponents off guard, and there will be little time to mount a response. According to Master Scalander, your personal participation in the defence would be the best strategy, given the circumstances."

languages.text: « Maître Scalander nous signale également que les {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukharis{/g} se préparent à lancer de nouvelles attaques contre votre territoire. Ses assistants continuent à nous faire parvenir des informations, et Achilleas vous contactera en personne dès que la cible du prochain raid aura été déterminée. Mais les Drukharis excellent dans l'art de surprendre leurs adversaires. Nous n'aurons donc que peu de temps pour réagir. D'après maître Scalander, votre participation directe à l'effort de défense constituerait la meilleure option stratégique. »
languages.original_text: "Master Scalander is also reporting the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are getting ready for more attacks on your territory. Information from his aides continues to arrive, and Achilleas will personally report to you the moment the target for the upcoming raid becomes clear. The Drukhari excel at catching their opponents off guard, and there will be little time to mount a response. According to Master Scalander, your personal participation in the defence would be the best strategy, given the circumstances."

traits.locale_text: « Maître Scalander nous signale également que les {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukharis{/g} se préparent à lancer de nouvelles attaques contre votre territoire. Ses assistants continuent à nous faire parvenir des informations, et Achilleas vous contactera en personne dès que la cible du prochain raid aura été déterminée. Mais les Drukharis excellent dans l'art de surprendre leurs adversaires. Nous n'aurons donc que peu de temps pour réagir. D'après maître Scalander, votre participation directe à l'effort de défense constituerait la meilleure option stratégique. »

languages.text: 「加えてスカランダー殿より、{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}があなたの領地へ更なる襲撃準備を進めているとの報告がきています。彼の側近からの情報は続々と届いていて、次の襲撃の目標が明らかになり次第、アキレアスが直々に報告するとのことです。デュカーリは不意打ちに長けていて、反撃する暇はほとんどありません。スカランダー殿の話では、今の状況を見ると、あなた自ら防衛に参加することが一番良い戦略だろうとのことです」
languages.original_text: "Master Scalander is also reporting the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are getting ready for more attacks on your territory. Information from his aides continues to arrive, and Achilleas will personally report to you the moment the target for the upcoming raid becomes clear. The Drukhari excel at catching their opponents off guard, and there will be little time to mount a response. According to Master Scalander, your personal participation in the defence would be the best strategy, given the circumstances."

traits.locale_text: 「加えてスカランダー殿より、{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}があなたの領地へ更なる襲撃準備を進めているとの報告がきています。彼の側近からの情報は続々と届いていて、次の襲撃の目標が明らかになり次第、アキレアスが直々に報告するとのことです。デュカーリは不意打ちに長けていて、反撃する暇はほとんどありません。スカランダー殿の話では、今の状況を見ると、あなた自ら防衛に参加することが一番良い戦略だろうとのことです」

languages.text: "Üstat Scalander, ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukharilerin{/g} bölgelerinize daha fazla saldırı düzenlemeye hazırlandığı raporunu veriyor. Emir erlerinden bilgiler gelmeye devam ediyormuş ve Achilleas, yaklaşan baskının hedefinin neresi olduğu netleşir netleşmez doğrudan size rapor vereceğini belirtiyor. Drukhariler, düşmanlarını hazırlıksız yakalamakta uzmandır ve misilleme yapmak için hazırlanacak çok az zamanımız olacak. Üstat Scalandera göre bu durum da göz önüne alındığında savunmaya bizzat iştirak etmeniz, en mantıklı strateji olurmuş."
languages.original_text: "Master Scalander is also reporting the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} are getting ready for more attacks on your territory. Information from his aides continues to arrive, and Achilleas will personally report to you the moment the target for the upcoming raid becomes clear. The Drukhari excel at catching their opponents off guard, and there will be little time to mount a response. According to Master Scalander, your personal participation in the defence would be the best strategy, given the circumstances."
